name: Ships Rule
description:
Ships Rule is about exploring and improving your ship with gold! Go around the world, defeat enemy ships and gather their resources to advance your ship! You can explore islands and find legendary treasures!

Features:

  • Quest System
  • Saving System
  • Tutorial
  • Procedural World
  • Islands
  • World Map
  • Shop
  • Banks
  • Weather System

Minimum Specs:

  • Dual core processor
  • Intel HD Graphics
  • At least 4 GB of Ram

Controls:

  • Q - Changes between light and heavy cannonballs
  • E - Changes to handmade cannonballs (uses wood)
  • Space/LMB - Fires from both sides
  • RMB - Chooses a point to move your ship to
  • A - Fires from left side of the ship
  • D - Fires from right side of the ship
  • Left Shift - (WHEN VISITING A PORT) Buy 5x the items
  • M/G - map
  • R - Repairs ship
  • Tab/Left Control - Shows more info about your ship
  • F12 - Takes screenshot
